titles.title: Censuring Representative Rashida Tlaib for antisemitic activity, sympathizing with terrorist organizations, and leading an insurrection at the United States Capitol Complex.
Censuring Representative Rashida Tlaib for antisemitic activity, sympathizing with terrorist organizations, and leading an insurrection at the United States Capitol Complex.

action.text: QUESTION OF THE PRIVILEGES OF THE HOUSE - Ms. Greene (GA) rose to a question of the privileges of the House and offered the resolution. The Chair directed the Clerk to report the resolution. Upon examination of the resolution, the Chair determined that the resolution did constitute a question of the privileges of the House.
Ms. Clark (MA) moved to table the measure.

vote.text: On motion to table the measure Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 186 (Roll no. 559).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary: This resolution censures Representative Rashida Tlaib.
